mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mbti_types ORDER BY type_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mbti_types (type_code, type_name, description, characteristics, strengths, weaknesses) VALUES (#{typeCode}, #{typeName}, #{description}, #{characteristics}, #{strengths}, #{weaknesses})
mapper.update: UPDATE mbti_types SET type_code = #{typeCode}, type_name = #{typeName}, description = #{description}, characteristics = #{characteristics}, strengths = #{strengths}, weaknesses = #{weaknesses} WHERE id = #{id}
